# NSTextBlock.Layer.padding

**Case**

Padding of the text block: space surrounding the content area extending to the border.

## Declaration

```swift
case padding
```

## Constants

- **NSTextBlock.Layer.border**: The border of the text block.
- **NSTextBlock.Layer.margin**: Margin of the text block: space surrounding the border.
